channel.title: meta on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Joost Plattel

item.title: The Metabiography, written in the cloud
item.description: Last month, most of my time was spend on a project for Yuri Veerman & Elsbeth Fraanje, who are part of the Quantified Reality project by het Mediafonds & the Sandberg Institute. Elsbeth and Yuri are exploring the possiblities of (auto)generating a biography from somebody's meta-data and created the the aptly named Metabiography. I was asked by Yuri & Elsbeth to build a working prototype For now, it's in pre-beta phase, but below is a screenshot how it could look like.
